title: Cooking with Sheri [instant trifle]

abstract: Cooking show featuring 10 year old Sheri Jobbins.
description: At the age of 9 Sheridan (Sheri) Jobbins presented 'Cooking with Sheri' on ATN 7. The show ran from 1967 - 1969. She was later credited by Guinness World Records as being the world's youngest television host.  A record that stood until 2006. In this episode, Sheri delights us with a simple instant trifle recipe.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003177; What's Cooking?; Active; 2016
